00011     def fitness(self, ind, user_feedback):
00012         '''
00013         Compute fitness.
00014         user_feedback is [best,worst]
00015         '''
00016         best, worst = user_feedback
00017         sumValue = 0
00018         if ind.genome == best.genome:
00019             sumValue = 2 * len(ind.genome)
00020         elif ind.genome == worst.genome:
00021             sumValue = 0
00022         else:
00023             #sumValue += lcs(ind.genome, best.genome)
00024             #sumValue += len(ind.genome)-lcs(ind.genome, worst.genome)
00025             sumValue += hamming(ind, best, worst)
00026 
00027         ind.scalefit = ind.fitness = sumValue
00028 
00029 
00030 #-------------------------------------------#
00031     def draw(self, parentPanel, subset):
00032         '''
00033         Return a list of panels to be displayed to the user for evaluation.
00034         Use the arg parentPanel as the parent for each of the panels created.
00035         '''
00036         import plot as _individual
00037         data_max = len(subset[0].genome)
00038         panels = []
00039         # Print individuals, number to display is specified in options dialog
00040         for i in xrange(len(subset)):
00041             panels.append(_individual.PlotPanel(parentPanel, i, sum(subset[i].genome), data_max))
00042 
00043         return panels
00044

00047     def report(self, pop, gen):
00048 
00049         best = max(pop)
00050         sumFit = reduce(lambda a,b: a + b.fitness, pop, 0)
00051             
00052         print '%i) Best Fit: %.2f, Avg Fit: %.2f' % (gen, best.fitness, sumFit/len(pop))
